bibl.title: Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93.)
bibl.note: front. coul., figg. et XXX pll. coul.

29 contributions, en partie issues d'un colloque organisé en 1998 par la British Academy. - Pp. v-vi: Preface (by the Advisory and General Editors); - 383-394: Index of Ancient Manuscripts (Papyri, Ostraca, Codices) and Inscriptions Cited; - 395-398: Index of Ancient and Medieval Works and Authors Cited; - 399-407: General Index. - City and Excavation. - Papyri, Society, and Government. - Literature, Art, and Science. - Archival Materials.
BOWMAN A.K., R.A. COLES, N. GONIS, D. OBBINK, P.J. PARSONS (Edd.), Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2007, 8°, xiv-407 pp., front. coul., figg. et XXX pll. coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-177-7. £65.
